name: ZkCloud
description: ZkCloud is the first decentralized cloud provider purpose-built for zero-knowledge computing. It’s a Layer 1 blockchain that delivers scalable, on-demand proof generation and verification across any ecosystem — from Web3 protocols to enterprise systems. Powered by a global network of high-performance hardware, ZkCloud enables massive parallelization of ZK workloads, offering extremely low proving fees, high availability, and unmatched flexibility. As the first credibly neutral proving layer, ZkCloud is positioned to serve the growing demand for zero-knowledge compute across the entire industry — far beyond just blockchains.
